p: All reagents and solvents used in these experiments are analytical reagent grade (A.R.) and were used without further purification unless stated otherwise. 2-chloro-4-nitroaniline (CNA, 98%, A.R.) and 2,5-dihydroxybenzoic acid (DHB, 99%, A.R.) were purchased from Ningbo Aike Biotechnology Co., Ltd.(Aike Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Ningbo, China), while 4,4â€²-Biphenol (DOD, 99%, A.R.) and progesterone (PROG, 99%, A.R.) were purchased from Heowns Biochem Technologies LLC. (Heowns Biochem Technologies LLC., Tianjin, China).
